name: 華國媛
objective: 基因體學工程學，是結合分子生物技術及電腦資訊科技的新領域。由於分子生物技術的快速發展，DNA定序的資料也在近幾年中以驚人的速度產生；而這大量的資料經由電腦資訊的整理分析，所延伸出來的知識，已被廣泛地運用在生物醫學上的研究。基因體學工程學，是現代生物科技必要的知識。
schedule:
wee 1/2. Genome Projects: Organization and Objectives
week 3/4 Genome Sequencing and Annotation Automated DNA Sequencing
week 5/6 SNPs and Variation
week 7/8 Group presentation
week 9/10/11 Gene Expression and the Transcriptome Parallel Analysis of Gene Expression: Microarrays
week 12/13/14 Proteomics and Functional Genomics Functional Proteomics
week 15/16/17 final presentation
week 18 Final written report
scorePolicy:
Group presentation (30%),
Final report (30%),
Quiz (30%),
Class participation (10%, absence: -5%)
materials:
A Primer of Genome Science,3rd edition, 2009 by Gibson
基因體學--人類生物學的應用, 陳水田　審校／謝榮峰．陳韻如．曾湘文　編譯, 2004, 藝軒
